about_the_game:
Spice up your intimate moments with...

"Sex Wheel - The Hardcore Edition"




A thrilling and engaging sex game that promises to surprise and delight. Perfect for those looking to inject excitement into their romantic escapades!
The Sex Wheel offers a simple yet exhilarating way to turn your bedroom encounters into a playful challenge.
After entering your names, the excitement begins. Just spin the Sex Wheel and anticipate the next enticing sex position that awaits you!

Once the wheel comes to a stop, the enchanting "Jana" will guide you through the chosen position, providing tips for maximum enjoyment. A tantalizing animation accompanies the instructions, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable experience.
Dive into the chosen position and revel in the moment until the timer signals a switch. Jana will notify you, allowing you to spin the wheel again. Feel free to end the position prematurely if you desire.
Check your progress with detailed statistics, tracking completed positions and total intimate minutes. Use the game to enhance your sexual stamina and physical fitness, aiming to unlock the 24 achievements!

Explore the erotic realm with:




  • 8 enticing positions
  • Detailed position descriptions
  • Select from four scenarios for the erotic encounter, such as a beach at sunset or an exotic nature scene on an alien planet
  • Choose between a male and female advisor, who will provide explicit instructions in a sultry voice
  • Animated demonstrations of each position
  • Track your achievements and pose statistics
  • Savor the experience with hot sound effects

Important Notice


While we guarantee an electrifying experience, we assume no liability for any unexpected consequences, especially in the form of unintended offspring. Play responsibly!

### Attention ###
- This Game is only for Adults!
- Naked adult people are shown in this game!
- Masturbation and sexual intercourse is shown!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains the representation of sex in words and pictures.
